- If you just want to share the Internet access - equal peers, then all you need is a hub or switch. This is simple hardware.

- if you want to have your server on the Internet and connect one or many other computers behind that, then first you need two ethernet cards in your ubuntu server eth0 and eth1. eth0 connects to the Internet. You then configure IP masquerading and aliasing from eth1 to eth0 so that your windows boxes can send and receive packets through the server to the Internet.
